comment._content: Rev. Dr. Robert Sherman Boyd (1880-1953), Presbyterian pastor, served at First Presbyterian Church in Greenville VA (1939-1947), and established several other congregations. married Belle Harris Herndon in 1909; three children. One daughter's obituary: www.starnewsonline.com/article/20030116/OBITS/301150012 Another daughter's gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=44828425 On 30 June 1915 he officiated at the wedding of his cousin, Genevieve Champ Clark, in Missouri. Her father was the Speaker of the House, Champ Clark. www.champclark.org/stories/genevieve-clark-thomson.html Genevieve elsewhere on Flickr: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3295498512/]
